short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle between White and Black modes for eye care while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Care Eye Mode is a practical browser extension designed to make your online browsing more comfortable. It helps reduce eye strain by letting you easily switch between two viewing modes:

White Mode: Ideal for bright environments, this mode provides a clear view with a white background and black text, making it easier to read.

Black Mode: Perfect for low-light settings, this mode changes the background to dark and the text to light, which helps lessen glare and makes reading more comfortable.

Why Use Care Eye Mode?

Reduce Eye Strain: Adjust the display based on your surroundings to help avoid discomfort from long periods of screen time.
Improve Readability: Choose the mode that suits your current environment for better text visibility.
Easy to Use: Simply click on the extension icon to switch between modes with no complicated setup.
Privacy Friendly: It requires minimal permissions, ensuring your browsing experience stays private and secure.
How It Works:

Install: Add Care Eye Mode to your browser.
Click: Open the extension from your toolbar.
Switch: Select between White Mode and Black Mode based on your needs.
Developed by Dr. Vinod Walwante, Partner at VVWMedia.com

Make your online experience easier on your eyes with Care Eye Mode. Install now to start using a more comfortable browsing setup!
